name: GUNS BATTLE ROYALE
description:
Start and search for gears and weapons! Get the better tactics against your opponents. Be the last one to stay on.

This a survival shooter game, where you fight in several open arenas! You can customise your outfit to make it even more unique and funny!

Compete with others to collect the hidden weapons and grenades. Shoot all your opponents so that only you can stay. Get the better results and be the best! You can choose which point of the arena you are going to start.
Features:

  • Online Players
  • Three difficulty levels
  • Multiplayer mode
  • Offline mode
  • Different types of arenas

You have to play against bots until online opponents will show up.

Set, Go, Collect!

  • Get the best guns from the ground and from the buildings.
  • Customise your avatar with unique accessories!

Low Polly Graphics styled game!

  • Try this low poly styled open game where you allow to play in multiple mode!
  • Create your own costume style and show them for the other players.

Get shooting and see how far you get with your tactic! Gain experience with the various arenas and find the hidden weapons or first aid kits!
Each weapon has different effects, get the best and start your best battle!
